titleStmt.title: Extract from the Brown Corpus (two samples)

sourceDesc.p: The Brown Corpus of Modern American English, compiled by Nelson Francis and Henry Kucera and rendered in TEI form by Lou Burnard.
A real bibliographic citation would be preferable here, but I'm in a hurry.

titleStmt.title: Sample A07 from The New York Times, June 19, 1961, p.1

"Wagner Attempt" by Leo Egan "Massachusetts ..." by Anthony Lewis "House Foes Plan" by David Halberstam "Peace Corps Ties" by John Wicklein "Red Bloc Spurs Aid" by Seymor Topping "Population Urged ..." by Robert Conley "3 Princes of Laos" by Drew Middleton
